documents.document: Love that @secondcaptains played out today's tennis segment with Serena's "Still I Rise." Had forgotten all about it
Great line to finish @rustyjackoâ€™s report on Federer-Nadal https://t.co/2tVr8NoIL3 https://t.co/jYz0muhFZx
Omar checks in after watching the Australian Open final https://t.co/MGaE6pPdc5

The dream was that we'd get a final worthy of two greats, and worthy of their rivalry.
A privilege.

Epic.
All throughout that game , torn between wanting Fed to close it out quickly, and wanting to enjoy this for another two hours.
Back on serve at 3-3 in the fifth. Whoever wins it from here, this has lived up to the billing and more
Can't say Federer hasn't had his chances in this fifth set
@decbruton Even towards the end of that 6-1 third, felt like momentum was shifting back towards Rafa

(George Hamilton voice)
Was that the chance? Let's hope not
#Federer #Nadal
@fotoole13 If this goes on much longer, the real victim will be the attendance in the Gaelic Grounds
Going to take some performance by Fed to win it from here though
So Federer - Nadal will go the distance. Was never really going to be any other way, was it?
Ah that's sensational from Nadal
LSC 116-114 for me but what do I know?
Also, since when does 4am ringwalk actually mean 4am ringwalk?!
For once, the plan of going to bed at 10 oâ€™clock and getting back up again worked. Maybe thatâ€™s a good omen? #Frampton #SantaCruz

Ruby Walsh asked about Faugheen's injury:
"I didn't know... that's made my day. I don't want to know"

Matt Chapman on ITV says a pulled muscle and "still hope" for Cheltenham.

Did Steve McManaman just say "He's probably offside but that's clutching at straws"?

This badly. https://t.co/7XhswbVmc9
Think I'd happily work every Saturday morning if I was watching Serena and Venus https://t.co/mXOrTzSXjt
I mean, that's a win-win. Dimitrov plays his part in an epic semi final but doesn't deny us the dream final on Sunday
13 minutes for the first game of the final set. Hope nobody in Melbourne was planning on sleeping tonight #Nadal #Dimitrov

"This Davies lad looks decent," he says to @fotoole13 20 seconds before the lad rips City to bits. Prescient.

That's that. Goodnight, New York
@SineadOCarroll He's a magician!
Seriously, at what point does a Hail Mary just become known as 'an Aaron Rodgers'? Because we must be getting close

Can we all just take a moment for Aaron Rodgers?
And another one.
Aaaaand another one...
